content.raw: I noticed some weird behavior when I try to quit Gazebo on this branch. There seems to be a significant delay between hitting CTRL-Q or Alt-F4 or even CTRL-C on the command line and the actual closure of the program. After running gzclient and gzserver separately, it seems that both of them delay after receiving a signal to quit. Could this be due to PollSensors?
content.html: I noticed some weird behavior when I try to quit Gazebo on this branch. There seems to be a significant delay between hitting CTRL-Q or Alt-F4 or even CTRL-C on the command line and the actual closure of the program. After running gzclient and gzserver separately, it seems that both of them delay after receiving a signal to quit. Could this be due to PollSensors?
